name: Puppy Petter
description:
How to play:

(Left) Click the puppy to give him pets! The more pets you have, the more treats you can buy! More treats = more pets! Watch out for the CATS though: (Right) click when they are near to defend your treats!

This was a quick prototype I worked on with the goal of learning the Godot game engine, so it's a bit rough and unpolished. Enjoy!

Follow my other work: https://twitter.com/ER_Interactive
